data.title: Location & Directions
data.text:
Location

The Hotel am Borsigturm is located in the district Tegel in the city district Reinickendorf. The hotel is quietly located in the immediate vicinity of the “Lake Tegel” and has a central character due to its excellent transport connections. The subway station "Borsigwerke" (U6) is only a 2-minute walk away and connects the hotel directly with the city center (15 minutes to Friedrichstraße).

Drive

You can reach us via the A 111 from Hamburg: exit "Holzhauser Straße" -> first traffic light right-> next traffic light turn right again-> Berliner Straße-> before the second Aral gas station left-> Am Borsigturm.

From the city center: motorway A 100 in direction Tegel Airport -> A 111 direction Hamburg-> exit "Holzhauser Straße" -> first traffic light left-> next traffic light right-> Berliner Straße-> before the second Aral gas station left-> At the Borsigturm.

From the direction of Hannover and Nürnberg: Direction Berlin - Zentrum via the Avus-> motorway A 100 direction Charlottenburg-> A111 direction Tegel and Hamburg-> exit "Holzhauser Straße" -> first traffic light left-> next traffic light right-> Berliner Straße- > Before the second Aral petrol station left-> At the Borsigturm.

Umweltzone Berlin

No environmental badge is required to reach the hotel! (motorway descent Holzhauserstr. - view directions) environmental badges are available in almost every workshop for 5.00 €! The vehicle license is required. We will be glad to help you and get your environmental badge (Mon. - Fri. 1 o'clock °° o'clock - 17. o'clock, with your vehicle license, for 5.00 €)

Directions for public transportation

From Tegel Airport

Bus 128 to Kurt-Schumacher-Platz-> change to underground U6, direction Alt-Tegel-> station "Borsigwerke" exit-> exit "Borsigturm", turn left.

From Berlin Hauptbahnhof

105m walk or tram 10 to subway U6 station Naturkundemuseum (Invalidenstrasse) - in the direction of Alt Tegel to station Borsigwerke - get off at station Borsigwerke - take the left exit in the direction of the driving direction you came in.

From Berlin Mitte (Alexanderplatz)

Bus 100 (direction Zoo) or S-Bahn (direction Westkreuz / Charlottenburg) to Friedrichstraße subway station -> change to underground U6 direction Alt-Tegel- Borsigwerke "Get out-> exit" Borsigturm ", left. The subway station "Borsigwerke" (U6) is only 50 meters from the hotel.
